meanings.definition: A very large city, typically with a population over ten million.
meanings.sent2: Tokyo and Shanghai are examples of megacities.
meanings.sent3: The megacities were so big that even the birds got lost!
meanings.sent4: In the sea of buildings, the megacities stood like giants.
meanings.sent5: The lights of the megacities sparkled like stars on the ground.

meanings.definition: The most populous cities in the world, characterized by rapid urbanization and high population density.
meanings.sent1: Megacities face challenges due to their large populations.
meanings.sent2: Urban planners study megacities to understand urbanization trends.
meanings.sent3: The megacities were so crowded that even finding a quiet spot was impossible!
meanings.sent4: In the race of progress, megacities sprint ahead of smaller towns.
meanings.sent5: The heartbeat of the world echoes in the bustling streets of megacities.
